pullRequest.title: WFCORE-4882 correct minOccurts value for host element in XSD
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFCORE-4882
Broken 'domain.xml' after migration of  leading to 'Boostrap error' in HAL.
A broken domain configuration
           <host-scoped-roles>
                <role name="custom-role-name" base-role="Administrator">
                </role>
            </host-scoped-roles>

This broken configuration doesn't bother the old HAL, so user only see the issue from HAL after the migration.
The correct one should be:
            <host-scoped-roles>
                <role name="dbaish" base-role="Administrator">
                    <host name="master"/>
                </role>
            </host-scoped-roles>

https://github.com/wildfly/wildfly-core/blob/11.0.0.Final/server/src/main/resources/schema/wildfly-config_9_0.xsd#L4567 show minOccurs="1"
Attribute host list should be required, thus a server boot error can be logged during migration
This PR only corrects the minOccruts value in XSD for the host element.

beforeCommit.message: WFCORE-4882 HOSTS list should be required

afterCommit.message: WFCORE-4882 correct minOccurts value for host element in XSD

nodes.bodyText:
We can not change any schema that has already been released.
That means that the only change we can make is in the new wildfly-config_13_0.xsd that I added last week that will be released with WildFly Core 13 (for WildFly 20)
